Aoteoroa Disability Data Hub

See data

Find data for and about disabled people in Aotearoa

Improve wellbeing through better, data-informed decisions.

Brought to you by

Welcome to Aoteoroa Disability Data Hub.

Aoteoroa Disability Data Hub brings together data, research and reports for disabled people in Aotearoa. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

Find data on disabled people's wellbeing, employment, housing, education, health, and more. Read reports that contain data about disabled people in NZ and other topics. We’ve also gathered a list of data experts and researchers in the disability space to help give important context to data.

Data empowers us

To work towards a better future for disabled people in Aotearoa, we need to build compelling, evidence-backed stories to advocate for change.

Data is a vital tool to help us understand, measure, manage, and assess issues and the impact of the changes we make.

Explore topics and charts

See interactive charts, data sources, definitions, and how and why data was collected. Take and use charts and data for free.

Find experts

Check out our directory of disability data experts, analysts, thinkers, and networks.

Read reports and presentations

Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of disabled people's life in Aotearoa through the lens of data

Find business figures

Explore data specific to your industries of work, workforce, and customer base.
